name: Its raining cubes~
description:
Its raining cubes~, from outta the sky, Cubes~, better shoot or you die. Get your glock & aim wide. Its raining cubes, BLAST 'EM-RATATATA(outta the sky).

Gomanasai(sorry)!!! The game has nio way to lose & you can go off screen. I have nio idead what to do about it.
